config.question: What triggered the war between Mexico and the United States during the years 1846–1848?

choices.content: American occupation of the republics of California and Texas
American occupation of the territory between the Nueces River and the Rio Grande
American implementation of trade tariffs on Mexican goods
Mexican demand for compensation for the annexation of Texas

answer_3.response: Consider This: The Mexican government refused to receive John Slidell, who was sent by Polk as an emissary to resolve the border dispute with Mexico. This forced the United States to occupy the disputed territory. See L.O. 13.1 Why did the United States annex Texas and the Southwest?
